description: Detects renamed jusched.exe used by cobalt group Author: Markus Neis, Swisscom. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Renamed jusched.exe
query: ((winlog.event_data.Description:"Java\ Update\ Scheduler" OR winlog.event_data.Description:"Java\(TM\)\ Update\ Scheduler") AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\jusched.exe)))
